sentences.english: The dense forest screened the guerrillas' movements.
sentences.chinese: 密林掩护了游击队员的行动。

sentences.english: They bandied the ball from player to player while they waited the game to start.
sentences.chinese: 他们在等比赛开始的时候把球在队员之间来回传递。

sentences.english: But just as quickly as new members come, they also go.
sentences.chinese: 随着新成员的加入，老队员也很快离去。

sentences.english: After the football match, the players turned in their uniforms.
sentences.chinese: 这场足球比赛之后，队员们把运动衣归还。

sentences.english: Israel says it killed at least 20 guerillas in the battle.
sentences.chinese: 以色列说，以军在战斗中至少打死20名游击队员。

sentences.english: Some reserves were named to cover the possibility of withdrawals.
sentences.chinese: 已指明一些替补队员，为可能有人退出比赛作准备。

sentences.english: Young players did well, especially our new spiker Wang Yimei.
sentences.chinese: 年轻队员打的不错，特别是我们的新主攻王一梅。

sentences.english: The names of the members of the team will be posted up today.
sentences.chinese: 队员名单将于今天张榜公布。

sentences.english: If no. 6 had set up better, Louis would have made a terrific spike.
sentences.chinese: 如果6号队员的二传更好些，路易斯就会扣个好球。

sentences.english: Bessler's widow offers his possessions to the state.
sentences.chinese: 消防队员的遗孀提供自己的财产交给国家。

sentences.english: The basketball player is really tall.
sentences.chinese: 这位篮球队员真是很高。

sentences.english: The smoke almost choked the fireman.
sentences.chinese: 消防队员几乎被烟熏得透不过气来。

sentences.english: Looking up into the sky, the players can not help stratagem to mind.
sentences.chinese: 抬头望向天空，队员们不禁计上心来。

sentences.english: A total of 14 fire engines and 66 firefighters were called to the site.
sentences.chinese: 所有的14台消防车和66名消防队员都赶至现场。

sentences.english: And all those absent in Nangang are important players.
sentences.chinese: 而且南钢缺席的又都是主力队员。

definition: to train together/to practice as a group
member of same class, team, work group etc/teammate
on stage/to go on stage/to take the field
club (the organisation or its premises) (loanword)/CL:個|个[ge4]
